string.name: stripe_card_scan_title
string.description: Text displayed above the scan window for paymentsheet, instructing the user how to scan card

resources.string: Position your card in the rectangle to scan

string.name: stripe_card_scan_instructions
string.description: Text displayed above the scan window, instructing the user how to scan card

string.name: stripe_card_scan_security
string.description: Security notification displayed below the scan window

string.name: stripe_card_scan_privacy_link_text
string.description: Privacy link text in scan window. THIS STRING SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED

resources.string: We use Stripe to verify your card details. Stripe may use and store your data according its privacy policy. Learn more

string.name: stripe_scanned_wrong_card
string.description: Text displayed above the scan window when the wrong card is scanned

string.name: stripe_camera_permission_denied_message
string.description: Message shown to the user when camera permission is denied

resources.string: Please allow camera access to scan your card

string.name: stripe_camera_permission_settings_message
string.description: Message shown to the user when camera permission is denied in fragment

resources.string: Please allow camera access in settings to scan your card

string.name: stripe_camera_permission_denied_ok
string.description: Affirmative button shown as part of the permission denied dialog

string.name: stripe_camera_permission_denied_cancel
string.description: Negative button shown as part of the permission denied dialog

string.name: stripe_logo
string.description: Accessibility description of the Stripe logo

string.name: stripe_security_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the security notification lock icon

string.name: stripe_preview_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the camera preview window

string.name: stripe_debug_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the debug preview window

string.name: stripe_close_button_description
string.description: Text used to close the scan window

string.name: stripe_torch_button_description
string.description: Text used to turn on the camera torch

string.name: stripe_swap_camera_button_description
string.description: Text used to swap the camera

string.name: stripe_card_view_finder_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the view finder window
